name: Shelfo and the Shelf Elves
description:
Some silly out-of-season project that exists only because of the theme. Made in Godot for TriJam 172, with the theme "off the shelf".

You are Santa and you have to shoot naughty elves off the shelf with your candy cane gun before they steal all your cookies. There will be small breaks from the hordes. But they will come back stronger, and many-er!

This project did NOT make it within the 3 hour limit. I work very slowly, so it is what it is.

All assets made by myself, with exception of the elves' screams of pain and suffering:

Super Dialogue Audio Pack V1, Produced by Dillon Becker (dillonbecker.com)
